summary: This document is a grand jury subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, commanding an individual to appear and testify before a grand jury on July 24, 2019, and to produce unspecified items. It includes an Advice of Rights and a request to keep the subpoena confidential.

persons.name: Geoffrey S. Berman
persons.context: Issued the grand jury subpoena as the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York.

events.title: Grand Jury Appearance
events.description: An individual is commanded to appear before the Grand Jury for the Southern District of New York to testify and give evidence regarding an alleged violation.

events.title: Subpoena Issued
events.description: The grand jury subpoena is dated and issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office.

locations: United States Courthouse, 40 Foley Square, Room 220, Manhattan, New York, NY
One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: A grand jury subpoena was issued on July 5, 2019, for an appearance on July 24, 2019, in connection with an official criminal investigation of a suspected felony.
The subpoena commands the recipient to testify and produce unspecified items, with failure to comply constituting contempt of court.
The U.S. Attorney's Office requested the recipient voluntarily refrain from disclosing the existence of the subpoena to preserve the confidentiality of the investigation.
The document includes an Advice of Rights informing the recipient of their right against self-incrimination and right to counsel.
